entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: SW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning this morning. Rain mixed with wet snow late this morning and early this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
